name: DEMO_2D Ball Roller Brick Tile map
name_original: DEMO_2D Ball Roller Brick Tile map
description:
A larger, sonic style ball rolling demo including:

  • A ball rolling player controller with hold based jump
  • A red brick tile map with alternative for  parallax background 
  • A water and buoyancy system for the player
  • A camera Sizing method based on players speed

Please find the Unity Assets Available Here:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1_UvhHHR29EsJ6ik7oL6ncssJ0qyVDiv2/view?usp=share...

(Note: this project includes a camera smoother which is currently broken)
